casebody.data:
PEABODY ENGINEERING CORPORATION, Plaintiff Appellant, v. TODD DRY DOCK ENGINEERING & REPAIR CORPORATION, Defendant Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 3, 1928. No. 127. Meyers & Jones, of New York City (Charles S. Jones and J. Granville Meyers, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Everett N. Curtis, of Chicago, Ill., and Frederick W. Barker, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
